content:
i saw there was a web archive of this chat here https://leanprover-community.github.io/

i love it and would love to do the same for one of my own Zulip domain; how can i do that? :)
Zulip has taken over maintenance of that tool at https://github.com/zulip/zulip-archive
weren't they working on making zulips publically accessible + indexable anyways?
